title: How to Draw a Little Girl

steps.headline: Draw a circle.
steps.description: Add curved line below for the jaw. Sketch a crossed line to indicate the center of the face.

steps.headline: Draw the torso and the hips.
Draw the hands.
steps.description: Position it flexed as if holding a book.

steps.headline: Draw the legs in crossed sitting position.
Now draw the details on the face looking below.
steps.description: Adjust to looks if you want to add a friends face.

steps.headline: Draw desired hair style and the outline of the face.
Draw the T-shirt and the book.
Draw details to the hands and the legs.
Draw a circle.
steps.description: Add curved line below for the jaw. Sketch a crossed line to indicate the center of the face.

steps.headline: Draw the neck, torso and the hips.
Draw the arms and the legs taking note of the location of the joints.
Draw the girl's face with a smile.
Add details such as dress and shoes.

tyn: Colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors
text: Little Girl (Reading a Book) Draw a circle. Add curved line below for the jaw. Sketch a crossed line to indicate the center of the face. Draw the torso and the hips.  Draw the hands. Position it flexed as if holding a book. Draw the legs in crossed sitting position.  Now draw the details on the face looking below. Adjust to looks if you want to add a friends face. Draw desired hair style and the outline of the face.  Draw the T-shirt and the book.  Draw details to the hands and the legs.  Erase unnecessary lines.  Color your drawing.  Little Girl (Standing Up) Draw a circle. Add curved line below for the jaw. Sketch a crossed line to indicate the center of the face. Draw the neck, torso and the hips.  Draw the arms and the legs taking note of the location of the joints.  Draw the girl's face with a smile.  Draw your desired hair style.  Add details such as dress and shoes.  Erase unnecessary lines.  Colour your drawing.

Little Girl (Standing Up) Draw a circle.
Add curved line below for the jaw.
Sketch a crossed line to indicate the center of the face.
Draw the neck, torso and the hips.
Draw the arms and the legs taking note of the location of the joints.
Draw the girl's face with a smile.
Draw your desired hair style.
Add details such as dress and shoes.
Erase unnecessary lines.
Colour your drawing.
